messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] need help
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I believe this list is set up to not allow images to be sent out.  You can either put them in the list s folder on yahoo and post with the file names in
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I believe this list is set up to not allow images to be sent out. You
can either put them in the list's folder on yahoo and post with the file
names in the message, or you
can post the images on some other photo sharing site (like flikr), and
post links to them.

best,

rkg
(Richard George)
> Hi ! Im new in this group.I intend to buy a sword and need help from
> anyone here before buying it.
>
> I have a few photos of it but unfortunately i cant upload it.Any advice
> to upload it so that someone
>
> can comment on the photos
>
> thanks
>

messages.messageBody:
Hi ! Im new in this group.I intend to buy a sword and need help from
anyone here before buying it.

I have a few photos of it but unfortunately i cant upload it.Any advice
to upload it so that someone

can comment on the photos

thanks
